GroupInfo.title: Filter Expressions
GroupInfo.description: Simple tests to evaluate filter sequence expressions.

test-case.name: filterexpressionhc1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple filter using data query from xml source and the "gt" operator.

test-case.name: filterexpressionhc2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple filter expression returning a sequence of integers between 1 and 25 divisible by 2.
